name_localized.en: Standard Double Room (dormer window - no lift)

short_description_localized.en: Standard Double Room (dormer window - no lift)
short_description_localized.es: Standard Double Room (dormer window - no lift)

description_localized.en:
1 Double Bed
140 sq feet (13 sq meters)

Internet - WiFi and wired Internet access
Entertainment - 21-inch LCD TV with satellite channels and pay movies
Food & Drink - Room service and minibar
Sleep - Select Comfort bed, premium bedding, and turndown service
Bathroom - Private bathroom, shower/tub combination, free toiletries, and a hair dryer
Practical - Safe and desk
Comfort - Air conditioning and daily housekeeping
Smoking/Non Smoking
